name: Girl with Fuzzy Balloon
description: The third piece in Volume 2 of "Fuzzy Masterpieces". We have grown accustomed to enjoying the world's masterpieces from afar, behind glass, ropes and barriers. We have forgotten that there are other sensory experiences to these pieces like texture. I created "Fuzzy Masterpieces" with this idea in mind. To evoke the desire to touch these pieces, to run your virtual hands through all their fuzzy glory and enjoy enjoy them as wonderfully furry works of art.
